title: Did Marvin Gaye Deliberately Record a Bad Album to Cheat His Ex-Wife Out of Royalties?
subtitle: The album 'Here, My Dear' chronicled the deterioration of Marvin Gaye's marriage into its heartbreaking, bitter, and angry end.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Marvin Gaye deliberately recorded a wretched album designed to sell poorly in order to cheat his ex-wife out of royalties.
